prayer_knowledge.name: Knowledge Domain Effect
prayer_knowledge.effect: Choose up to three allies within 10 squares of you. Each ally has a double edge on the next power roll they make.

cypher_mind.name: Cypher Mind

option.name: Cypher Mind
option.description: You can translate almost any text into a language you know.

cypher_mind.effect: Given a little time, you can translate almost any text into a language you know, even if you don't know the text's original language. For the purpose of making project rolls, you are considered fluent in all languages.
